dev.eternalformula.api.ecs.components.physics

Class LightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.eternalformula.api.ecs.components.physics.LightComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.ashley.core.Component, EFComponent, TranslatableComponent, UpdatableComponent, Copyable

    public class LightComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements EFComponent, UpdatableComponent, TranslatableComponent
    The LightComponent is a component that attaches a light source to an entity.
    Since:
    Alpha 0.0.2

      • maxFlickerDistance

        public float maxFlickerDistance
        The max distance from the original distance for flickering. Eg. if lightDistance is 5 and maxFlickerDistance is 0.2, the farthest possible lightDistance values would be 4.8 and 5.2
